name: Swedish Hard Tack
author: twistedsister
summary: Very nice with butter or cheese. Biscuit-like (crunchy) and sweet. Also called knackebrod.
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Sift together the flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt into a large bowl
Rub in the shortening until the mixture appears sandy
Stir in the buttermilk until the dough holds together
Roll out on a lightly floured surface to 1/8-inch thick
Cut into 4-inch squares, then cut each square diagonally into triangles, and prick with a fork
Bake the triangles in preheated oven on ungreased cookie sheets until dry and lightly browned, about 10 minutes
